hp_max.name: Max Health
hp_max.tooltipDescription: Characters die if their Health is completely depleted.

hp_regen.name: Health Regen
hp_regen.tooltipDescription: The amount of Health regenerated every 10s.

cost_max.name: Max Mana
cost_max.tooltipDescription: The amount of energy for using skills.

cost_regen.name: Mana Regen
cost_regen.tooltipDescription: The amount of Mana regenerated every 10s.

cost_consumption_modifier.name: Mana Cost Efficiency
cost_consumption_modifier.tooltipDescription: Reduces the amount of Mana used for skills.

adjust_item_drop.name: Item Chance
adjust_item_drop.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to acquire items.

spend_dungeon_point_modifier.name: Abyssal Contract Token Efficiency
spend_dungeon_point_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases the efficiency of using Abyssal Contract Tokens.

magic_doll_heal_modifier.name: Amitoi Healing
magic_doll_heal_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases the amount of Health restored by Amitoi.

skill_power_amplification.name: Skill Damage Boost
skill_power_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases damage and recovery from skills. For every 10 points, chance increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

skill_power_resistance.name: Skill Damage Resistance
skill_power_resistance.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from skills. For every 10 points, chance increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

debuff_taken_duration_modifier.name: Debuff Duration
debuff_taken_duration_modifier.tooltipDescription: Decreases the duration of incoming debuff effects.

attack_speed_main_hand.name: Attack Speed
attack_speed_main_hand.tooltipDescription: The time it takes to deal normal attacks and skill attacks with your main weapon.

adjust_resource_drop.name: Crafting Material Chance
adjust_resource_drop.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to acquire Crafting Materials.

attack_range_main_hand.name: Range
attack_range_main_hand.tooltipDescription: The attack range of the main weapon. The attack range is limited to a maximum of 30m.

melee_armor.name: Melee Defense
melee_armor.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from melee attacks.

range_armor.name: Ranged Defense
range_armor.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from ranged attacks.

magic_armor.name: Magic Defense
magic_armor.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from magic attacks.

shield_block_chance.name: Shield Block Chance
shield_block_chance.tooltipDescription: The chance of blocking an attack with your shield. On a successful block, decreases damage taken and prevents CC effects other than Weakened.

pvp_melee_critical_attack.name: PvP Melee Critical Hit Chance
pvp_melee_critical_attack.tooltipTitle: PvP Melee Critical Hit Chance {0}
pvp_melee_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of melee attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_range_critical_attack.name: PvP Ranged Critical Hit Chance
pvp_range_critical_attack.tooltipTitle: PvP Ranged Critical Hit Chance {0}
pvp_range_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of ranged attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_magic_critical_attack.name: PvP Magic Critical Hit Chance
pvp_magic_critical_attack.tooltipTitle: PvP Magic Critical Hit Chance {0}
pvp_magic_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of magic attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_melee_critical_defense.name: PvP Melee Endurance
pvp_melee_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from melee attacks in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Critical Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_range_critical_defense.name: PvP Ranged Endurance
pvp_range_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from ranged attacks in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Critical Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_magic_critical_defense.name: PvP Magic Endurance
pvp_magic_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from magic attacks in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Critical Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

str.name: Strength
str.tooltipDescription: Serves as the source of physical prowess. Provides strong Defense in addition to increasing Max Health, Health Regen, Max Damage, and Min Damage.

pvp_melee_double_attack.name: PvP Melee Heavy Attack Chance
pvp_melee_double_attack.tooltipTitle: PvP Melee Heavy Attack Chance {0}
pvp_melee_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Melee Heavy Attacks during PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_range_double_attack.name: PvP Ranged Heavy Attack Chance
pvp_range_double_attack.tooltipTitle: PvP Ranged Heavy Attack Chance {0}
pvp_range_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Ranged Heavy Attacks during PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_magic_double_attack.name: PvP Magic Heavy Attack Chance
pvp_magic_double_attack.tooltipTitle: PvP Magic Heavy Attack Chance {0}
pvp_magic_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Magic Heavy Attack during PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_melee_double_defense.name: PvP Melee Heavy Attack Evasion
pvp_melee_double_defense.tooltipTitle: PvP Melee Heavy Attack Evasion {0}
pvp_melee_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance to get hit by Melee Heavy Attack and take double damage in PvP. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

pvp_range_double_defense.name: PvP Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion
pvp_range_double_defense.tooltipTitle: PvP Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion {0}
pvp_range_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Getting hit by Ranged Heavy Attack decreases the chance to take double damage during PvP. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

pvp_magic_double_defense.name: PvP Magic Heavy Attack Evasion
pvp_magic_double_defense.tooltipTitle: PvP Magic Heavy Attack Evasion {0}
pvp_magic_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Getting hit by Magic Heavy Attack decreases the chance to take double damage during PvP. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

dex.name: Dexterity
dex.tooltipDescription: Serves as the source of nimbleness. Increases quickness and critical attacks in addition to Evasion and Max Damage.

int.name: Wisdom
int.tooltipDescription: Serves as the source of mental prowess. Increases Max Mana and Mana Regen in addition to cooldown abilities and Max Damage.

per.name: Perception
per.tooltipDescription: Serves as the source of insight and awareness. Heightens awareness during battle. Increases the accuracy of attacks, CC effects, the duration of Buffs, and Max Damage and Min Damage.

boss_melee_critical_attack.name: Boss Melee Critical Hit Chance
boss_melee_critical_attack.tooltipTitle: Boss Melee Critical Hit Chance {0}
boss_melee_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of melee attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_range_critical_attack.name: Boss Ranged Critical Hit Chance
boss_range_critical_attack.tooltipTitle: Boss Ranged Critical Hit Chance {0}
boss_range_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of ranged attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_magic_critical_attack.name: Boss Magic Critical Hit Chance
boss_magic_critical_attack.tooltipTitle: Boss Magic Critical Hit Chance {0}
boss_magic_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of magic attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_melee_critical_defense.name: Boss Melee Endurance
boss_melee_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from melee attacks by bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Critical, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_range_critical_defense.name: Boss Ranged Endurance
boss_range_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from ranged attacks by bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Critical, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_magic_critical_defense.name: Boss Magic Endurance
boss_magic_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from magic attacks by bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Critical Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_melee_double_attack.name: Boss Melee Heavy Attack Chance
boss_melee_double_attack.tooltipTitle: Boss Melee Heavy Attack Chance {0}
boss_melee_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Melee Heavy Attacks against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_range_double_attack.name: Boss Ranged Heavy Attack Chance
boss_range_double_attack.tooltipTitle: Boss Ranged Heavy Attack Chance {0}
boss_range_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Ranged Heavy Attacks against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_magic_double_attack.name: Boss Magic Heavy Attack Chance
boss_magic_double_attack.tooltipTitle: Boss Magic Heavy Attack Chance {0}
boss_magic_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Magic Heavy Attacks against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_melee_double_defense.name: Boss Melee Heavy Attack Evasion
boss_melee_double_defense.tooltipTitle: Boss Melee Heavy Attack Evasion {0}
boss_melee_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Getting hit by Boss's Melee Heavy Attack decreases the chance to take double damage. For every 10 points, decrease the chance by about 1%.

boss_range_double_defense.name: Boss Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion
boss_range_double_defense.tooltipTitle: Boss Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion {0}
boss_range_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Getting hit by Boss's Ranged Heavy Attack decreases the chance to take double damage. For every 10 points, decrease the chance by about 1%.

boss_magic_double_defense.name: Boss Magic Heavy Attack Evasion
boss_magic_double_defense.tooltipTitle: Boss Magic Heavy Attack Evasion {0}
boss_magic_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Getting hit by Boss's Magic Heavy Attack decreases the chance to take double damage. For every 10 points, decrease the chance by about 1%.

all_accuracy.name: Hit Chance
all_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of normal attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with skills. For every 10 points, Hit Chance increases by about 1%.

all_critical_attack.name: Critical Hit Chance
all_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of attacks landing as Critical Hits and dealing Max Damage. For every 10 points, Critical Hit Chance increases 1%.

all_double_attack.name: Heavy Attack Chance
all_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increase the chance to deal double damage with Heavy Attacks. For every 10 points, chance +1%.

attack_rating.name: Hit Chance
attack_rating.tooltipDescription: Stat is not visible to the user.

all_evasion.name: Evasion
all_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading attacks. For every 10 points, evasion chance increases by about 1%.

all_critical_defense.name: Endurance
all_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Hits and taking Min Damage from attacks. For every 10 points, chance increases by about 1%.

all_double_defense.name: Heavy Attack Evasion
all_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance of taking double damage from Heavy Attacks. For every 10 points, Critical Hit Chance decreases by about 1%.

boss_all_accuracy.name: Boss Hit Chance
boss_all_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of normal attacks and the chance of applying CC effects with skills against bosses. For every 10 points, Hit Chance increases by about 1%.

boss_all_critical_attack.name: Boss Critical Hit Chance
boss_all_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of attacks landing as Critical Hits that deal Max Damage against boss monsters. Every 10 points increases Critical Hit Chance about 1%.

boss_all_double_attack.name: Boss Heavy Attack Chance
boss_all_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increase the chance to deal double damage to bosses with Heavy Attacks. For every 10 points, chance increases about 1%.

boss_all_evasion.name: Boss Evasion
boss_all_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading attacks dealt by bosses. For every 10 points, chance increases by about 1%.

boss_all_critical_defense.name: Boss Endurance
boss_all_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from attacks dealt by boss monsters. Every 10 points increases Endurance about 1%.

boss_all_double_defense.name: Boss Heavy Attack Evasion
boss_all_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance of taking double damage from a boss's Heavy Attacks. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

melee_accuracy.name: Melee Hit Chance
melee_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of melee attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with melee skills. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_all_accuracy.name: PvP Hit Chance
pvp_all_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of normal attacks and the chance of applying CC effects with skills during PvP. For every 10 points, Hit Chance increases by about 1%.

pvp_all_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Hit Chance
pvp_all_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of attacks landing as Critical Hits that deal Max Damage against opponents in PvP. Every 10 points increases Critical Hit Chance about 1%.

pvp_all_double_attack.name: PvP Heavy Attack Chance
pvp_all_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage by Heavy Attack during PvP. For every 10 points, chance increases about 1%.

pvp_all_evasion.name: PvP Evasion
pvp_all_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading attacks during PvP. For every 10 points, chance increases by about 1%.

pvp_all_critical_defense.name: PvP Endurance
pvp_all_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from attacks dealt by opponents in PvP. Every 10 points increases Endurance about 1%.

pvp_all_double_defense.name: PvP Heavy Attack Evasion
pvp_all_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Getting hit by Heavy Attack decreases the chance to take double damage in PvP. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

all_state_accuracy.name: CC Chance
all_state_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to inflict CC. For every 10 points, chance increases about 4%.

all_state_tolerance.name: CC Resistances
all_state_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist CC. For every 10 points, chance increases about 4%.

range_accuracy.name: Ranged Hit Chance
range_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of ranged attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with ranged skills. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

grankus_damage_amplification.name: Barbarian Damage Boost
grankus_damage_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases damage dealt to Humanoids. For every 10 points, damage increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

undead_damage_amplification.name: Undead Damage Boost
undead_damage_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases damage dealt to Undead. For every 10 points, damage increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

animal_damage_amplification.name: Wildling Damage Boost
animal_damage_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases damage dealt to Wildkin. For every 10 points, damage increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

creation_damage_amplification.name: Construct Damage Boost
creation_damage_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases damage dealt to Constructs. For every 10 points, damage increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

demon_damage_amplification.name: Daemonus Damage Boost
demon_damage_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases damage dealt to Demons. For every 10 points, damage increases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

grankus_damage_resistance.name: Humanoid Damage Resistance
grankus_damage_resistance.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from Humanoids. For every 10 points, damage taken decreases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

undead_damage_resistance.name: Undead Damage Resistance
undead_damage_resistance.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from Undead. For every 10 points, damage taken decreases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

animal_damage_resistance.name: Wildling Damage Resistance
animal_damage_resistance.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from Wildkin. For every 10 points, damage taken decreases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

creation_damage_resistance.name: Construct Damage Resistance
creation_damage_resistance.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from Constructs. For every 10 points, it decreases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

magic_accuracy.name: Magic Hit Chance
magic_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of magic attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with magic skills. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

demon_damage_resistance.name: Daemonus Damage Resistance
demon_damage_resistance.tooltipDescription: Decreases damage taken from Demons. For every 10 points, damage taken decreases by about 1%. As the number increases, the efficiency decreases.

adjust_fishing_drop_large.name: Large Fish Bite Chance
adjust_fishing_drop_large.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance that a large fish bites.

adjust_fishing_drop_medium.name: Medium Fish Bite Chance
adjust_fishing_drop_medium.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance that a medium fish bites.

adjust_fishing_drop_small.name: Small Fish Bite Chance
adjust_fishing_drop_small.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance that a small fish bites.

melee_evasion.name: Melee Evasion
melee_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Melee Evasion chance. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

range_evasion.name: Ranged Evasion
range_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Ranged Evasion chance. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

magic_evasion.name: Magic Evasion
magic_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Magic Evasion chance. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

melee_critical_attack.name: Melee Critical Hit Chance
melee_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of melee attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage. magic_critical_attack.name: Magic Critical Hit Chance
magic_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of magic attacks landing as critical hits and dealing Max Damage. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Endurance, for every 10 points of difference, Critical Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

melee_critical_defense.name: Melee Endurance
melee_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from melee attacks. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Critical Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

range_critical_defense.name: Ranged Endurance
range_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from ranged attacks. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Critical, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

magic_critical_defense.name: Magic Endurance
magic_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading critical hits and taking Min Damage from magic attacks. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Critical Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

off_hand_attack_chance.name: Off-Hand Double Attack Chance
off_hand_attack_chance.tooltipDescription: The rate of attack with your off-hand weapon when dealing a normal attack or using a skill.

melee_double_attack.name: Melee Heavy Attack Chance
melee_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Melee Heavy Attacks. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

range_double_attack.name: Ranged Heavy Attack Chance
range_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increase the chance to deal double damage with Ranged Heavy Attacks. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

magic_double_attack.name: Magic Heavy Attack Chance
magic_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to deal double damage with Magic Heavy Attacks. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Heavy Attack Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, increase the chance by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

melee_double_defense.name: Melee Heavy Attack Evasion
melee_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance of taking double damage from Melee Heavy Attacks. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

range_double_defense.name: Ranged Heavy Attack Evasion
range_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance of taking double damage from Ranged Heavy Attack. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

magic_double_defense.name: Magic Heavy Attack Evasion
magic_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance of taking double damage from Magic Heavy Attacks. For every 10 points, chance decreases by about 1%.

weaken_accuracy.name: Weaken Chance
weaken_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to Weaken a target. If your stat is higher than the target's Weaken Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

stun_accuracy.name: Stun Chance
stun_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to Stun targets. If your stat is higher than the target's Stun Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

petrification_accuracy.name: Petrification Chance
petrification_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to Petrify a target. If your stat is higher than the target's Petrification Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

sleep_accuracy.name: Sleep Chance
sleep_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to inflict Sleep. If your stat is higher than the target's Sleep Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

silence_accuracy.name: Silence Chance
silence_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to a Silence a target. If your stat is higher than the target's Silence Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

blind_accuracy.name: Fear Chance
blind_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to inflict Fear. If your stat is higher than the target's Fear Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

bind_accuracy.name: Bind Chance
bind_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to Bind a target. If your stat is higher than the target's Bind Resistance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

attack_power_main_hand.name: Damage
attack_power_main_hand.tooltipDescription: Base Damage when attacking with your main weapon.

collide_amplification.name: Collision Chance
collide_amplification.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to inflict Collision Effect, and the displacement distance. If your stat is higher than the target's Collision Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, chance and distance increase about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

weaken_tolerance.name: Weaken Resistance
weaken_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Weaken. If your stat is higher than the target's Weaken Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

stun_tolerance.name: Stun Resistance
stun_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Stun. If your stat is higher than the target's Stun Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

petrification_tolerance.name: Petrification Resistance
petrification_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Petrification. If your stat is higher than the target's Petrification Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

sleep_tolerance.name: Sleep Resistance
sleep_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Sleep. If your stat is higher than the target's Sleep Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

silence_tolerance.name: Silence Resistance
silence_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Silence. If your stat is higher than the target's Silence Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

blind_tolerance.name: Fear Resistance
blind_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Fear. If your stat is higher than the target's Fear Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

bind_tolerance.name: Bind Resistance
bind_tolerance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Bind. If your stat is higher than the target's Bind Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

collide_resistance.name: Collision Resistance
collide_resistance.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance to resist Collision Effects and reduce displacement distance. If your stat is higher than the target's Collision Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases about 4%, and distance is reduced by the same amount. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

attack_power_off_hand.name: Off-Hand Weapon Damage
attack_power_off_hand.tooltipDescription: Base Damage when attacking with your off-hand weapon.

potion_heal_modifier.name: Potion Healing
potion_heal_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases the amount of Health restored by Recovery Crystals.

bonus_attack_power_main_hand.name: Base Damage
bonus_attack_power_main_hand.tooltipDescription: Base Damage when attacking with your main weapon.

stamina_max.name: Max Stamina
stamina_max.tooltipDescription: The energy used for movement abilities. It is consumed while swimming, gliding, and doing other movements.

stamina_regen.name: Stamina Regen
stamina_regen.tooltipDescription: The amount of Stamina regenerated every 10s.

bonus_attack_power_off_hand.name: Base Damage
bonus_attack_power_off_hand.tooltipDescription: Base Damage when attacking with your off-hand weapon.

attack_speed_mod.name: Added Attack Speed
attack_speed_mod.tooltipDescription: The increased percentage in Attack Speed.

off_hand_attack_chance_modifier.name: Off-Hand Double Attack Chance
off_hand_attack_chance_modifier.tooltipDescription: The increased percentage in Off-Hand Weapon Attack Chance.

stun_immune.name: Stun Immunity
stun_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being Stunned that you can't be Stunned again.

petrification_immune.name: Petrification Immunity
petrification_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being Petrified that you can't be Petrified again.

sleep_immune.name: Sleep Immunity
sleep_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being affected by Sleep that you can't be affected by Sleep again.

silence_immune.name: Silence Immunity
silence_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being Silenced that you can't be Silenced again.

bind_immune.name: Bind Immunity
bind_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being Bound that you can't be Bound again.

blind_immune.name: Fear Immunity
blind_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being affected by Fear that you can't be affected by Fear again.

collide_immune.name: Collision Immunity
collide_immune.tooltipDescription: The max time after being affected by Collision Effects that you can't be affected by Collision Effects again.

global_skill_cooldown_modifier.name: Global Cooldown Speed
global_skill_cooldown_modifier.tooltipDescription: Decreases cooldown of skills that are used consecutively.

shield_block_efficiency.name: Shield Damage Reduction
shield_block_efficiency.tooltipDescription: The percent of damage your shield prevents on a successful block.

pvp_melee_accuracy.name: PvP Melee Hit Chance
pvp_melee_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of melee attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with melee skills in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_range_accuracy.name: PvP Ranged Hit Chance
pvp_range_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of ranged attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with ranged skills in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_magic_accuracy.name: PvP Magic Hit Chance
pvp_magic_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of melee attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with melee skills against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Melee Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_melee_evasion.name: PvP Melee Evasion
pvp_melee_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Melee Evasion chance in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_range_evasion.name: PvP Ranged Evasion
pvp_range_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Ranged Evasion chance in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

pvp_magic_evasion.name: PvP Magic Evasion
pvp_magic_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Magic Evasion chance in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

weaken_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Weaken Chance
weaken_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Weaken and Weaken effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

stun_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Stun Chance
stun_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Stun and Stun effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

petrification_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Petrification Chance
petrification_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Petrification and Petrification effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

sleep_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Sleep Chance
sleep_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Sleep and Sleep effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

silence_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Silence Chance
silence_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Silence and Silence effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

blind_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Fear Chance
blind_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Fear and Fear effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

bind_critical_attack.name: PvP Critical Bind Chance
bind_critical_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Critical Bind and Bind effects that last for the full Max Duration during PvP.

weaken_critical_defense.name: PvP Weaken Endurance
weaken_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Weaken and Weaken effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

stun_critical_defense.name: PvP Stun Endurance
stun_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Stun and Stun effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

petrification_critical_defense.name: PvP Petrification Endurance
petrification_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Petrification and Petrification effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

sleep_critical_defense.name: PvP Sleep Endurance
sleep_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Sleep and Sleep effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

silence_critical_defense.name: PvP Silence Endurance
silence_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Silence and Silence effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

blind_critical_defense.name: PvP Fear Endurance
blind_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Fear and Fear effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

bind_critical_defense.name: PvP Bind Endurance
bind_critical_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Critical Bind and Bind effects lasting for the min duration during PvP.

weaken_double_attack.name: PvP Double Weaken
weaken_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Double Weaken, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

stun_double_attack.name: PvP Double Stun
stun_double_attack.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of applying Double Stun, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

weaken_double_defense.name: PvP Double Weaken Evasion
weaken_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Double Weaken Evasion, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

stun_double_defense.name: PvP Double Stun Evasion
stun_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Double Stun, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

sleep_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Double Sleep, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

silence_double_defense.name: PvP Double Silence Evasion
silence_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Double Silence, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

blind_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Double Fear, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

bind_double_defense.name: PvP Double Bind Evasion
bind_double_defense.tooltipDescription: Increases the chance of evading Double Bind, which doubles the duration of the effect during PvP.

boss_melee_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of ranged attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with ranged skills against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Ranged Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_range_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of magic attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with magic skills in PvP. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_magic_accuracy.tooltipDescription: Increases the Hit Chance of magic attacks and the chance to apply CC effects with magic skills against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Magic Evasion, for every 10 points of difference, Hit Chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

boss_melee_evasion.tooltipDescription: Increases Melee Evasion chance against bosses. If your stat is higher than the target's Hit Chance, for every 10 points of difference, chance increases by about 1%. As the difference increases, efficiency decreases.

gathering_critical_chance.name: Special Item Chance
gathering_critical_chance.tooltipDescription: The chance to get special items when gathering.

dash_fast_move_speed_modifier.name: Dash Morph Accel. Bonus
dash_fast_move_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases bonus to Acceleration Rate while in Dash Morph.

dash_normal_move_speed_modifier.name: Dash Morph Speed Bonus
dash_normal_move_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases bonus to Movement Speed while in Dash Morph.

swim_fast_move_speed_modifier.name: Aqua. Morph Accel. Bonus
swim_fast_move_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases bonus to Acceleration Rate while in Aquatic Morph.

swim_normal_move_speed_modifier.name: Aqua. Morph Speed Bonus
swim_normal_move_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases bonus to Movement Speed while in Aquatic Morph.

glide_fast_move_speed_modifier.name: Glide Morph Accel. Bonus
glide_fast_move_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases bonus to Acceleration Rate while in Glide Morph.

glide_normal_move_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases bonus to Movement Speed while in Glide Morph.

stamina_consumption_modifier.name: Stamina Cost Efficiency ▲
stamina_consumption_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases Stamina Cost Efficiency while dashing, swimming, and gliding.

shield_block_chance_penetration.name: Shield Block Penetration Chance
shield_block_chance_penetration.tooltipDescription: Decreases the chance to block an attack with the shield.

critical_damage_dealt_modifier.name: Critical Damage
critical_damage_dealt_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases the damage upon landing Critical Hits.

critical_damage_taken_modifier.name: Critical Damage Reduction
critical_damage_taken_modifier.tooltipDescription: Decreases the damage received from a Critical Hit.

move_speed.name: Movement Speed
move_speed.tooltipDescription: Basic move speed. Also impacts jump distance.

attack_speed_modifier.name: Added Attack Speed
attack_speed_modifier.tooltipDescription: The increased percentage in Attack Speed.

aura_radius_modifier.name: Aura Range
aura_radius_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases the area of effect of Aura effects.

heal_taken_modifier.name: Recovery Effect
heal_taken_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases amount recovered when restoring Health.

heal_modifier.name: Skill Heal
heal_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases the amount healed by skills.

skill_heal_taken_modifier.name: Healing Received
skill_heal_taken_modifier.tooltipDescription: Increases amount healed by skills used on the user.
